title: How to get transactional a repository ?
body:
Hello,
I want to use the Panache's repository pattern. But extending the `PanacheRepository` doesn't provide transactional operations. For example, the following repository:
 
    @ApplicationScoped
    public class BookRepository implements PanacheRepository<Book> {}

won't provide me with a transactional `persist()` operation. Accordingly, I have to override all the required write only methods in `PanacheRepository` in order to add `@Transactional` to them. And there are a lot of them. How could I get transactional write only operations from the `PanacheRepository` while avoiding having to override all these methods ?

Many thanks in advance.

Nicolas
